ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, cubed into bite sized pieces
1 package of Old El Paso Stand 'N Stuff Flour Tortilla Shells
⅓ cup of Rotel Tomatoes (with the juice too, don't drain it off)
⅓ cup of your favorite ranch dressing
½ of a red onion, chopped
optional: salsa and sour cream on the top
optional: salsa and sour cream on the top
